p: Nunu increases the attack speed and movement speed of Willump and a nearby ally, and causes Willump's basic attacks to damage enemies around the target.
q: Willump takes a bite out of a minion, monster, or enemy champion, dealing damage and healing himself.
w: Willump creates a snowball that grows in size and speed as he rolls it.  The snowball damages and knocks up enemies.
e: Nunu throws multiple snowballs that damage enemies.  When he's finished, Willump roots any champions or large monsters that were hit by a snowball.
r: Nunu & Willump create a powerful blizzard in an area that slows enemies and deals massive damage at the end.
